Articles.Content:
Hello, my name is Chris, and I have been playing this game ever since the Asteroid update. This is only the second internet forum I have joined, however I am sure I can fit in with the rest of you. As for my KSP skillfulness, I have never gone interplanetary (at least, not on purpose). As well as KSP, other games I play include star citizen, minecraft, spaceengine and civilization v BNW. I also have great interests in real life space exploration, and I have previously closely followed curiosity, dawn, rosetta and most Chinese and SpaceX missions.

Cheers!

Hi Chris. Welcome to the forums!

There are many, many space enthusiasts around here.

Happy landings!
Cant wait to see you shine in the forums. Welcome to the forums Chris.

A fellow aussie? One can only hope...

A welcome for you nonetheless!

It's ok, I've never done a planned interplanetary mission.

Welcome!

Hi Chris! Welcome to the Forums, where everyone is welcome.

We are really nice here, so we hope you enjoy your stay.
Welcome! Hope you have a great time here.
